review: We have an older Roku & had been using that box to watch Amazon content previously.  When the Fire TV Stick was announced, I was offered it at a reduced price because of my Prime Membership.  Received it two days later & had it set up in a very short time.  I love it for the ease of navigation, much easier than our older Roku's menu/navigation (and WAY better than our Sony blu-ray dvd player's navigation).  The Fire Stick is a little buggy still and sometimes I have to reset it (ie unplug it from the tv & the wall, then plug it back in again and restart), but for the cost, I can live with that little inconvenience once in awhile.  I imagine that there will be a software update that can fix the errors I've seen, so I'll be patient & look for that soon.  Overall, love it!
